features.name: Dashboard Home
features.description: Professor/student landing with actions to create quizzes, navigate to quiz editor and student quiz.

features.name: Quiz Editor
features.description: Edit quiz questions, reorder, delete, set max marks and correct answers. Configure timer buffer/duration.

features.name: Student Quiz
features.description: Student takes quiz with 5-minute buffer, optional timer, floating timer UI, input locking, draft answer autosave.

features.name: Results Dashboard
features.description: Professor views submissions, integrity violations, extension URL logs, per-question grading save.

features.name: Profile Settings
features.description: User profile and password update, avatar upload to Supabase Storage.

features.name: Gemini & OCR API
features.description: Image parsing via Gemini with retry/backoff and OCR fallback; diagnostics and test endpoints.

features.name: Middleware & Auth
features.description: Next middleware route allowlist for API testing; Supabase client/server auth utilities.

features.name: Storage Buckets
features.description: Supabase Storage paths used by app: question banks, drafts, grades, avatars.

features.name: Integrity Monitor
features.description: Tab switch detection and logging; extension URL log correlation to allowed domains.
